participant_1.background:
I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.
I like movies that make me feel something, whether it's happy, sad, scared, or anything in between.
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I'm not sure if I'm a healthy person, but I'm trying my best to live a healthy lifestyle.
I love my parents very much and am grateful for all they have done for me.

participant_2.background:
I keep a journal of my memories to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger.
I am a 25 year old male who is concerned about his health and weight.
I like to spend time on websites about pens and lobster.
my dad and i own over 600 movies.
I like to pamper myself.

content.text: I have a lot of favorites! But I think my favorite movie is The Shawshank Redemption.
Oh that's a great movie! I love the ending.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to write in my journal to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger.
That's a great way to keep track of your memories.
Yeah, it's really helpful. I also like to spend time on websites about pens and lobster.
Pens and lobster? That's an interesting combination.
I know, right? I just find them both really interesting.
What do you like about pens?
I like the way they feel in my hands, and I love the different colors and styles.
I can understand that. I love the way pens feel in my hands too.
I've never had lobster, but I've heard it's delicious.
It is! I love the way it tastes.
Maybe I'll have to try it sometime.
